General.Name: Tayih Lun An Co Ltd
General.Description: Tayih Kenmos Auto parts Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells automotive blow molding and filtration parts in Taiwan and internationally. It offers automobile cabin air filters, automatic transmission filters, home air purifier filters, face masks, and other products; running boards; and pickup sport bars, tonneau covers, and other exteriors. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Tainan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.6, Huanxi Road, Tainan City, Taiwan, 744
